name: Tuin
description:
Plant seeds, pull weeds and sell vegetables - all while doing something else! Expand your garden more and more by buying new plots, installing irrigation systems, or fully automating your farm for maximum profit. What will your garden look like?

Features
  • Fun idle game 😴
  • 8 different crops to farm 🧅🌾🌽
  • 50+ buyable items 🛒
  • 10+ farm animals 🐴
  • Electricity and Automation 💡
  • Online highscores 🏆


Sokpop makes a new game every month!
Subscribe for 3$ per month at http://sokpop.co
